articles.author: Lois Beckett
articles.title: ‘Pens down!’: Hollywood writers strike as late-night comedy shows go dark - The Guardian
articles.description: Members of the Writers Guild of America picket major studios as they demand higher pay and rules for AI
articles.content:
Outside Amazon Studios in Los Angeles, the striking writers of Hollywood had a promise for studio executives: AI will replace you before it replaces us.
Diandra Pendleton-Thompson, 32, was carrying … [+6286 chars]
